question: Which of the following is among the reasons for disguised unemployment in rural areas?
option1: Choice of a heavy industry model for economic development
option2: Low levels of technological development in the country
option3: Heavy pressure of population along with half-hearted implementation of agrarian reforms
answer: Heavy pressure of population along with half-hearted implementation of agrarian reforms
explanation:
The causes for disguised unemployment are many. Few of which are following:
• Population growth: High growth in population leads to surplus labour, especially in the rural areas.
• Limited skills and knowledge about better opportunities: Disguised unemployment is also caused by limited skills of the labourers.
